DOC.brief_summary: This protocol clinical trial evaluate reliability bite fork diagnostic instrument subject pulpal necrosis apical periodontitis .
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical trial consist two part . We first use bite fork normal volunteer evaluate test-retest inter-rater reliability . We use bite fork subject differ endodontic diagnosis compare result standard clinical diagnostic test ( percussion ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient must least 16 year age . 2 . Clinical indication nonsurgical root canal therapy ( NSRCT ) . 3 . 1st 2nd maxillary mandibular molar premolar 4 . Diagnosis must chronic apical periodontitis ( CAP ) without symptom . 5 . Intact , mature apex . 6 . American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) I II . 1 . Failure meet 2 . Previous NSRCT 3 . Previous pulpotomy pulpectomy 4 . Suppurative apical periodontitis 5 . Patients take medication affect pain rating medication affect immune system ( glucocorticoid )
